data.title: Overview and Frequently Asked Questions: Oracle Acquires 360commerce
data.meta_description: Faq - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 360Commerce is a leading provider of Java-based store and multi-channel retail solutions. The combination of 360Commerce's products with Oracle's leading database infrastructure and ERP applications is expected to provide a highly integrated solution for the customer insight-driven retail enterprise. 360Commerce partners will also gain access to a much larger customer set through Oracle's global marketing and delivery teams.
